translation.en: [man] It's a brave new world, isn't it?
Within a decade, we could be reviving extinct species.
translation.fr: D'ici dix ans, on pourrait raviver des espèces disparues.

translation.en: The thylacline, the woolly mammoth, saber-toothed cats.
translation.fr: Le thylacine, le mammouth laineux, le tigre à dents de sabre.

translation.en: Looks like Steven Spielberg's gonna get his park after all.
translation.fr: Steven Spielberg pourrait bien avoir son parc.

translation.en: I think you've had to listen to me for long enough.
No matter what your politics are,
translation.fr: Quel que soit votre parti politique,

translation.en: we know that climate change is causing glacial deterioration.
translation.fr: nous savons que la fonte des glaces est due au changement climatique.

translation.en: We also know that there are viruses and bacterias
translation.fr: Nous savons aussi que des virus et des bactéries
sont pris au piège dans cette glace fondante.

translation.en: a prehistoric equivalent of the Zika virus,
translation.fr: qu'un équivalent préhistorique du virus Zika,

translation.en: were to appear as a result of the melt.
translation.fr: apparaisse à la suite de la fonte,

translation.en: Our bodies would have no immunity.
And we would have no vaccines that could help us.
translation.fr: Et aucun vaccin n'y pourrait rien.

translation.en: I don't think it's going to be asteroids or nuclear war that wipes us out.
translation.fr: un astéroïde ou une guerre nucléaire ne causeront pas notre perte.

translation.en: Ancient forms of these pathogens could start a pandemic
translation.fr: D'anciennes formes de ces agents pathogènes dont la pandémie

translation.en: that makes the bubonic plague look like-- like a chicken pox party.
translation.fr: ferait passer la peste bubonique pour la varicelle.

translation.en: This isn't nature crying out for help.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas la nature qui demande de l'aide.

translation.en: And that is why I'm calling on you,
translation.fr: Je fais donc appel à vous,

translation.en: to come together and pool your resources and knowledge to get ahead of this.
translation.fr: afin de rassembler vos ressources et votre savoir pour surmonter ça.
La science n'a pas de frontières,

translation.en: And the data tells us that this is inevitable.
translation.fr: Et les chiffres disent que c'est inévitable.

translation.en: Listening to you talk about mass extinction really gets me goin'.
translation.fr: Ça m'excite quand tu parles d'extinction de masse.

translation.en: Um... I'm sorry. I'm a... married man.
I apologize for the interruption, Dr. Swann.

translation.fr: - C'est notre anniversaire de mariage. - Oui.

translation.en: Dr. Lansing is a colleague -from the Arctic Science Exchange. -Oh.
translation.fr: Dr Lansing est un collègue de l'Arctic Science Exchange.

translation.en: It's probably terrible timing, but, um...
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas le moment idéal, mais...

translation.en: we lost contact with Dr. Vercernis
translation.fr: on n'a plus de nouvelles du Dr Vercernis

translation.en: at the Arctic Research Station three days ago.
translation.fr: à la station de recherche depuis trois jours.

translation.en: Oh, well, the weather regularly knocks out communications there.
translation.fr: La météo perturbe souvent les transmissions.

translation.en: -I'm... I'm sure he's okay. -Yes, you're probably right.
translation.fr: - Je suis sûr qu'il va bien. - Vous avez sans doute raison.

translation.en: The thing is, last we heard from him,
he'd found something, and he was pretty excited.
translation.fr: il avait découvert une chose et était surexcité.

translation.en: He wanted to talk to you about it.
Needless to say, we're all anxious to get some updates.
translation.fr: Inutile de dire qu'on aimerait tous avoir des nouvelles.

translation.en: -Well, I can't. I mean-- -It... It's fine.
translation.fr: - Je ne peux pas. - C'est rien.

translation.en: We can celebrate our anniversary any time.
translation.fr: On peut fêter ça n'importe quand.

translation.en: -♪ Watch it burn, watch it burn ♪ -[phone rings]

translation.fr: - Ça va, mon frère ? - Mikey. T'es occupé ?

translation.en: Okay, good, good. Yeah, I need your help. How fast can you get here?
translation.fr: Tant mieux. J'ai besoin de toi. Tu peux venir vite ?

translation.en: Damn, Luther, you need to get a research station somewhere warmer,
translation.fr: Trouve-toi une station de recherche dans un endroit chaud

translation.en: like the Caribbean or some shit.
You should be here in the winter!
-How many people you say live up here? -Two.
translation.fr: Combien de gens vivent ici ? Deux.

translation.en: Well, there's no one here now.
Luther, take a look at this.
-What? What is it? -No, no, no, no. Step back. Step back.
Some kind of biomass. Something he found.
translation.fr: Une sorte de biomasse qu'il a trouvée.

translation.en: Let's get the hell outta here, man.
We gotta call this in, Mike.
We've transported the biomass and a skull fragment to your lab
translation.fr: Nous avons amené la biomasse et un fragment de crâne à votre labo

translation.en: Any results for any of the tests?
What about the mycology reports I requested?
Um... Did the search team find anything?
translation.fr: L'équipe de recherche a trouvé quelque chose ?

translation.en: There's no sign of him or Ava.
translation.fr: Aucun signe de lui ou d'Eva.

translation.en: [sighs] I'm sorry I got you into this, Mikey.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé de t'avoir mêlé à ça.
Mais on est une famille, non ?

translation.en: We are gonna be okay, right?
Yeah, we're gonna be all right, Mike.
[man on PA] Dr. Swann, your family's here.
translation.fr: Dr Swann, votre famille est là.

translation.en: Are you okay? When are you guys gonna be coming home?
translation.fr: Ça va ? Vous rentrez quand à la maison ?

translation.en: Well, when we start to feel better.
Have I ever let anything happen to your dad?

translation.fr: - Non. - Je vais pas commencer maintenant.

translation.en: [boy] I don't have any, Uncle Mike.
-One more and that's "jackass" for you. -Fuck you!
translation.fr: - Je suis presque à "bêtasse". - Va te faire !

translation.en: -I always used to win at this game! -Huh.
translation.fr: Je gagnais toujours à ce jeu !

translation.en: Just as shitty as the last time.
translation.fr: Pas plus que la dernière fois.

translation.en: I will give you one guess about today's news.
translation.fr: Je vous laisse deviner la nouvelle du jour.

translation.en: Wait, Emil, we don't know why we're not shedding the virus yet.
translation.fr: Attendez. On ignore pourquoi on n'élimine pas le virus.

translation.en: There is a huge lack of results.
Yes, there's a lack of results because no one put it on record.
translation.fr: Car personne n'avait fait de rapport.

translation.en: It's a harmless Ice Age-era cold.
translation.fr: C'est un rhume inoffensif de l'ère glaciaire.

translation.en: Pack your things. Go to your family.
translation.fr: Prenez vos affaires. Rentrez chez vous.

translation.en: Well, you don't have to tell me twice.
translation.fr: On me le dira pas deux fois.

translation.en: [chuckles] You heard the man, Luther. Let's get the fuck outta here.
Mrs. Swann, are you trying to seduce me?
translation.fr: Mme Swann, tentez-vous de me séduire ?

translation.en: Mrs. Swann... ahem, as a doctor,
translation.fr: Mme Swann, en tant que médecin,

translation.en: I must advise you that any sexual contact, um...
translation.fr: je dois vous informer que tout contact sexuel

translation.en: [announcer] Police are saying little about this latest killing.
translation.fr: La police en dit peu sur ce dernier meurtre.
La victime, une femme de 33 ans,

translation.en: was pronounced dead on the scene in downtown Seneca.
translation.fr: a été déclarée morte au centre-ville de Seneca.

translation.en: Authorities acknowledge possible links to two previous deaths,
translation.fr: Les autorités voient un lien potentiel avec deux autres décès,

translation.en: whose family members are demanding police be more forthcoming
translation.fr: dont la famille demande que la police soit honnête

translation.en: about the brutal nature of these killings,
translation.fr: sur la brutalité de ces meurtres,

translation.en: stating the public need to know
the extent of the danger that they may be in.
Oh, Jesus, Michael. Why would you leave your door open like that?
translation.fr: Bon sang. Pourquoi tu laisses ta porte ouverte ?

translation.en: You dropped me for another job.
translation.fr: Tu m'as laissé tomber pour une autre fille.

translation.en: Mm. Well, that's a new one.
Yeah, I wish I was lying, but it's actually true.
That's why I told you on the phone...
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je t'ai dit...

translation.en: I'm gonna make it up to you.
You like to talk, don't you, Michael?
I said are you taking me to dinner?
Well, we gotta go. I have an open house in the morning.
[Luther] Why am I not getting anywhere with you?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu ne me révèles rien ?

translation.en: If that thing talks back, I am so out of here.
translation.fr: Si ce truc te répond, je me tire.

translation.en: I thought these samples would be swimming with pathogens.
translation.fr: Je pensais qu'ils seraient couverts de pathogènes.

translation.en: I can't even find a virus or a bacteria.
translation.fr: Pas de virus, pas de bactérie.

translation.en: Amino fluorescence test came back negative too.
At least I'm starting to feel more like myself.
Fayne said he's never felt better.
translation.fr: Fayne est au top de sa forme.

translation.en: [man on TV] Police discourage talk of a serial killer despite this latest body
translation.fr: La police refuse de parler de tueur en série malgré le corps

translation.en: and certain rumored similarities between the crime scenes of the various victims.
translation.fr: et certaines similitudes entre les scènes de crime.

translation.en: At a news conference this afternoon,
Seneca Police Chief Paul MacErlane appealed to anyone
translation.fr: le chef de la police, Paul MacErlane a demandé à ceux

translation.en: who may have any information about this latest death to come forward to police.
translation.fr: ayant des informations sur ce meurtre de se présenter à la police.
MacErlane a ajouté que son équipe

translation.en: [echoing] ...have combed through hours of surveillance video...
translation.fr: avait passé en revue les vidéos de surveillance,

translation.en: Hi. How did it go? -[woman] Oh, my God. -[laughs]
translation.fr: - Salut. Alors ? - Tu vas pas me croire !

translation.en: So the veggies, chips, and dip are a really great option
translation.fr: Les légumes avec frites et sauce sont excellents

translation.en: if you're looking for something a little bit lighter.
translation.fr: si vous voulez un repas plus léger.

translation.en: I'll make it up to you.
When? When will you make it up to me?
Don't bitch about this. It's my living.
translation.fr: Te plains pas. C'est mon gagne-pain.
- Les est un voleur. - Je suis flic.

translation.en: This better be good, Les. You really screwed the mood around here.
translation.fr: Ça a intérêt à être bon. T'as vraiment cassé l'ambiance.

translation.en: Raw footage on the new kill.
[woman] What the fuck happened to her neck?
translation.fr: Il a eu quoi, son cou ?

translation.en: Put this up right away, Jer-gen. Top of the landing page.
translation.fr: Publie ça de suite. En haut de la page d'accueil.

translation.en: I saw my guy, Dr. Mackie, last week.
translation.fr: J'ai vu Dr Mackie la semaine dernière.

translation.en: Thought it was an infection, but he couldn't find anything.
translation.fr: Il pensait à une infection, mais n'a rien trouvé.

translation.en: Weird stuff's been happening in my head.
translation.fr: J'ai des trucs bizarres dans la tête.

translation.en: I was sitting here at the bar the other night.
translation.fr: J'étais assis au bar l'autre soir.

translation.en: I had two drinks, that's it.
And all of a sudden, I'm...
Maybe you were just a little...
No. I'm talking about people across the room.
translation.fr: Non. Je parle de gens à l'autre bout de la pièce.

translation.en: And I could read a menu 40 feet away.
translation.fr: Et je lisais le menu à 15 mètres.

translation.en: I'm not exactly sure that's possible.
translation.fr: Pas sûr que ce soit possible.

translation.en: No, no, if you were delusional, you would think it was real. But...
translation.fr: Non, si tu délirais, tu penserais que c'est vrai. Mais...

translation.en: But I do know there's something wrong with me.
translation.fr: Mais je sais que j'ai un problème.

translation.en: Well, we'll... we'll run some tests, for sure.
translation.fr: On va te faire des examens.

translation.en: I'm sure it's nothing to worry about.
That's what I say to you whenever there's a lot to worry about.
translation.fr: C'est ce que je te dis quand c'est pas rien.

translation.en: You know this is illegal, right?
The coroner's department's paid for by taxpayer dollars.
translation.fr: Les contribuables paient le département du légiste.
En théorie, on est des contribuables.

translation.en: They've no right to withhold information about a series of vicious murders.
translation.fr: Ils peuvent pas cacher des infos sur des meurtres aussi atroces.

translation.en: Get me every autopsy on the killer's victims.
Not much blood left in them.
translation.fr: Ils ont presque plus de sang.

translation.en: Might have something to do with being torn apart.
translation.fr: Peut-être le fait d'avoir été éventré.

translation.en: According to this, there was less than there should be.
translation.fr: Il y en avait moins que la normale.

translation.en: None of these victims have more than two.
translation.fr: Aucune de ces victimes n'en ont plus de deux.

translation.en: And the blood found at the murder scene doesn't account for what's missing.
translation.fr: Et le sang trouvé sur la scène du meurtre n'explique pas ce qui manque.

translation.en: [assistant] So, the electron test results came back.
translation.fr: On a les résultats des tests d'électrons.

translation.en: second batch was negative, and Fayne's sample was inconclusive.
translation.fr: le deuxième aussi, et l'échantillon de Fayne peu concluant.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It's time to send it offshore.
translation.fr: Il est temps de faire ça à l'étranger.

translation.en: Proteins that cause really bad shit like mad cow.
translation.fr: Des protéines causant des problèmes comme la vache folle.
C'est très rare et très contagieux.

translation.en: Boy, you sure know how to talk to a girl.
translation.fr: Tu sais comment parler à une fille.

translation.en: how about we all drive over to Emilio's and get a pizza?
translation.fr: Et si on allait chez Emilio chercher une pizza ?

translation.en: I thought I was going to get a much different offer.
translation.fr: Je m'attendais à une offre différente.

translation.en: [laughs] I haven't told you what we could do for dessert.
translation.fr: Je t'ai pas parlé du dessert.

translation.en: I need your help right now.
-I don't know how it happened, man. -What are you talking about?
translation.fr: Je sais pas ce qui s'est passé. De quoi tu parles ?

translation.en: -Michael! What the-- what the fuck? -Luther, I didn't--
You have to believe me! I didn't do this!
translation.fr: Tu dois me croire. C'était pas moi !

translation.en: I didn't do this. All right? I don't know what happened!
translation.fr: Tu dois me croire. C'était pas moi ! Je sais pas ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: -Who is she? -I don't know what... I don't...
-How'd you get here? What happened? -No, I mean...
translation.fr: Comment t'es arrivé ici ? Il s'est passé quoi ?

translation.en: -I-- I don't know. -What do you mean you don't know, Mike?
translation.fr: - Je sais pas. - Comment ça, tu sais pas ?

translation.en: I remember I was having a beer. I'm in the bar talking to her,
translation.fr: Je buvais une bière. Je lui parlais au bar

translation.en: and she asks me if I could walk her home.
translation.fr: et elle me demande de la raccompagner.

translation.en: -And then that-- that thing started again. -What thing?
With my-- with my senses, my hearing, my sight.
translation.fr: Mes sens, mon ouïe, ma vue.

translation.en: [panting] Everything went all crazy, and then...
It just slipped out. -I don't remember anything. -Okay. Okay. Mike...
translation.fr: - Je me souviens de rien. - D'accord. Mike...

translation.en: Sh, sh, sh. You walk her home, right?
Wait! I-- I remember us getting to her building and then...
translation.fr: Je me rappelle qu'on est arrivés en bas de son immeuble et...

translation.en: Luther, you know me more than anybody else.
You know that I couldn't do this.
translation.fr: Tu sais que j'aurais jamais fait ça.

translation.en: -We gotta call the police. -No! They won't believe me.
translation.fr: - On doit appeler la police. - Non. Ils me croiront pas.

translation.en: -Mike, you didn't do anything! -It's open and shut!
translation.fr: - T'as rien fait. - C'est ton opinion.

translation.en: I'll go to prison, and we won't know who did this.
translation.fr: J'irai en prison et on saura pas qui a fait ça.

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about?
Yeah, that's-- that's who did this shit. Some guy was threatening her.
translation.fr: C'est lui qui a fait ça. Un type la menaçait.

translation.en: That's who did this shit. I just need time to find the guy.
translation.fr: C'est lui qui a fait ça. J'ai besoin de temps pour le trouver.

translation.en: -I just need some time to find the guy. -No, Mike. We gotta lawyer up.
translation.fr: - J'ai besoin de le trouver. - Non, on doit te trouver un avocat.

translation.en: When we're ready, sure. I'll do what's right, I promise you.
translation.fr: Oui, je ferai ce qu'il faut.

translation.en: I promise you, but right now, I just need some time.
translation.fr: Mais pour l'instant, j'ai besoin de temps.

translation.en: -I'm calling the cops. -No, Luther! Listen to me!
-I didn't do this! You know I didn't! -Sh, sh!
translation.fr: C'était pas moi ! Tu le sais !

translation.en: -I didn't do this! -Mike, stop. Stop, okay?
What do you have in mind?
-Uh... -Tell me. You're my best friend, right?
translation.fr: - Dis-moi. - T'es mon meilleur ami, non ?

translation.en: Can you help me clean her apartment?
translation.fr: Tu m'aides à nettoyer son appart ?

translation.en: It doesn't work like that, Michael.
translation.fr: C'est pas comme ça que ça marche.

translation.en: No. Forensics are too good now. It's the 21st century.
translation.fr: La médecine légale a évolué. On est au 21e siècle.

translation.en: But we could slow them down.
Right? Just to buy me some time to find the guy.
translation.fr: Non ? Pour gagner du temps et trouver le type.

translation.en: You're my only hope, man. Please.
translation.fr: T'es mon seul espoir. Je t'en prie.

translation.en: You gotta help me. Help me get outta this.
translation.fr: Tu dois m'aider à m'en sortir.

translation.en: I didn't do it. I didn't do it.
So, what the hell happened last night?
translation.fr: Il s'est passé quoi hier soir ?

translation.en: [man] It's just past the tracks up here on the right-hand side.
translation.fr: C'est juste après les rails, sur la droite.

translation.en: I have to go to the police.
translation.fr: Je dois aller à la police.

translation.en: But I'm telling them things that they need to know.
translation.fr: Mais je dois leur révéler des choses.

translation.en: How could you have done this?
I owe the guy my life...
I couldn't just turn my back on him.
Uh-- I know. I-- I know.
Listen... I-- I-- Obviously, there are things I have to make right...
translation.fr: Écoute. Je dois arranger certaines choses.

translation.en: I'll be back in a little bit, okay?
This looks good. Just sign it here.
Uh... My name is Dr. Luther Swann.
translation.fr: Je suis le Dr Luther Swann.

translation.en: I'm a research physician at Bremerton.

translation.fr: J'ai fait un truc de mal.

translation.en: Uh, a friend of mine hurt someone...
and I may have helped cover up the crime.
translation.fr: et je l'ai aidé à dissimuler le crime.

translation.en: How bad did he hurt this person?
I think you'd better come with me.
Get your hands in the air!
You know it's obstruction. You'll go for five years, right?
translation.fr: C'est une entrave à la justice. Cinq ans de prison.

translation.en: That's why it's only five. Sit down!
translation.fr: Et on a allégé la peine. Assis !
Vous auriez dû amener un avocat.

translation.en: I wasn't thinking about finding a lawyer. I'm here to help you find Michael Fayne.
translation.fr: J'y pensais pas. Je veux vous aider à trouver Michael Fayne.
Il essayait de tuer une autre femme.

translation.en: We had to shoot him to make him stop.
translation.fr: On a dû lui tirer dessus.

translation.en: We talked to him two hours, and he was just fine, thanks.
translation.fr: On lui a parlé deux heures, et il allait très bien, merci.

translation.en: That he won't talk to us on any substantive level.
translation.fr: Il refuse de nous raconter les détails.
Il ne veut parler qu'à vous.

translation.en: How'd they get you here so fast?
He injured four officers on the way in here.
I think he was exposed to pathogens that are causing this behavior.
translation.fr: Il a été exposé à des agents pathogènes responsables de son comportement.

translation.en: I can hear you, you know.
Do you see what I mean?
There's something very strange going on with this man.
But the problem is he's not the only killer.
translation.fr: Mais il n'est pas le seul tueur.

translation.en: There's another guy, a dentist who committed suicide.
translation.fr: Un autre gars, un dentiste, s'est suicidé.

translation.en: We got his DNA from crime scene three and four.
translation.fr: On a trouvé son ADN sur les scènes de crime 3 et 4.
Celui de Fayne sur la un et la deux.

translation.en: The other killer was a dentist?
Fayne saw his dentist last week.
translation.fr: Fayne a vu son dentiste récemment.

translation.en: Hey, Mike. What's the name of your dentist?
I need to get in there and talk to him. Alone.
translation.fr: Je dois aller lui parler. Seul.

translation.en: He said he would only talk to me.
translation.fr: Il ne voulait parler qu'à moi.

translation.en: I always thought getting shot would hurt a lot more.
translation.fr: Je pensais que ça ferait mal.

translation.en: None of this is making sense.

translation.fr: comme si tu devenais plus fort.

translation.en: I mean, the elevated sense of hearing, the sight,
translation.fr: Le sens de l'ouïe, la vue,

translation.en: That would require alterations on a cellular level.
translation.fr: Ça nécessiterait des modifications au niveau cellulaire.

translation.en: There must've been something on that biomass.
Okay, so then why is none of this shit happening to you?
translation.fr: Pourquoi t'as pas la même chose ?

translation.en: I don't know that yet, Mike.
translation.fr: Je ne le sais pas encore, Mike.

translation.en: I mean, maybe it needs a-- a cofactor, I guess.
But something is causing these changes.
translation.fr: Mais quelque chose provoque ces changements.

translation.en: I did it, Luther. I killed her and the others.
translation.fr: C'était moi. Je les ai tuées.

translation.en: -What? No, no, no. Not here. -I think I...
translation.fr: - Quoi ? Pas ici. - Je crois que...

translation.en: -It's like I can't control it, you know. -Not here. Mikey, stop it.
translation.fr: - Je ne contrôle rien. - Pas ici. Mikey, arrête.

translation.en: -It's like I'm turning into someone else. -Mikey-- In the name of God, please help me.
translation.fr: C'est comme si j'étais quelqu'un d'autre. Pitié, aide-moi.

translation.en: Mikey, until you get a lawyer, shut up. They're listening.
translation.fr: Tant que t'as pas d'avocat, ferme-la. Ils écoutent.

translation.en: I don't mean help me get out of here. I mean...
How did you say they found you?
about an hour and a half ago.
translation.fr: il y a une heure et demie.

translation.en: that new Rover you just bought,
And then they tased me, and I forgot it.
translation.fr: Et un coup de taser m'a fait oublier.

translation.en: -Till now. -I am here for you, Michael.
Yes. It's not just sight and sound, Luther.
translation.fr: Oui. C'est pas que ma vue, mon ouïe.
Amenez tous les renforts. Salle d'interrogatoire numéro 1.

translation.en: I'm not afraid of you, Mike.
I don't even want cash for this. I want points.
translation.fr: Je veux même pas de fric. Je veux un pourcentage.

translation.en: Two serial killers, one captured, one dead, and new murder photos?
translation.fr: Deux tueurs : un en prison, un mort et de nouvelles photos de meurtre ?

translation.en: I call TMZ with that, you lose everything.
translation.fr: Si j'appelle TMZ, tu perds tout.

translation.en: I give it to you, you break the internet.
translation.fr: Si je te le donne, tu feras le buzz.

translation.en: Only if I get to meet him.
He went batshit in interrogation, super violent.
translation.fr: Il a perdu la boule pendant l'interrogatoire.

translation.en: They're sending him to Seneca Psych for secure care.
-I know the place. -I can't get you in.
translation.fr: - D'accord. - Je peux pas te faire entrer.

translation.en: and I'll send you the pics right now.
Look at these crime scene photos he just sent me of the latest victim.
translation.fr: Mate les photos du dernier crime qu'il vient d'envoyer.

translation.en: I bet you all her blood is gone...
translation.fr: Je parie que son sang a disparu...

translation.en: Who knows? It could be true.
translation.fr: Qui sait ? Ça pourrait être vrai.

translation.en: We got the results of PMC testing back.
translation.fr: On a les résultats du test PMC.

translation.en: But these particular prions are unknown.
They've recovered prions from all three samples.
translation.fr: Ils ont récupéré les prions des trois échantillons.

translation.en: Biomass, ancient human skull, and a living adult male.
translation.fr: De la biomasse, du crâne humain et un mâle adulte.

translation.en: West parking lot outside the front entrance.
translation.fr: Parking à l'ouest devant l'entrée principale.

translation.en: You're breaking into a secure unit to find a serial killer,
translation.fr: Tu vas chercher un tueur en série dans un centre sécurisé,

translation.en: Somebody pulling something wouldn't stop for a coffee.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un faisant un sale coup ferait pas ça.

translation.en: What's going on? Where the hell have you been?
It's bad news about Mike, Jess.
You mean the mad cow thing?
translation.fr: Le truc de la vache folle ?

translation.en: You had that fever too, you know.
We don't know anything yet, Jess.
But if the changes in him are caused by prions, this thing could spread.
translation.fr: Si des prions l'ont affecté, ça pourrait se propager.
Il va pas rester dans les vapes.

translation.en: but if we re-medicate this guy, we could kill him.
translation.fr: Mais un surdosage, et on peut le tuer.

translation.en: I'd like to ask you a few questions.
You don't smell like a doctor.
translation.fr: Vous avez pas l'odeur d'un médecin.

translation.en: I want to help you tell your side of the story, Mr. Fayne.
translation.fr: Je veux vous aider à raconter votre version, M. Fayne.

translation.en: The bullet wounds are almost completely healed,
and his hemoglobin's off the scale.
translation.fr: et son taux d'hémoglobine est très élevé.

translation.en: Maybe that ties into the missing blood.
All the victims have been missing a lot of blood.
translation.fr: Toutes les victimes ont perdu beaucoup de sang.

translation.en: Way more than we can account for at the scenes.
Now, if he ingested the victims' blood--
translation.fr: S'il a bu le sang des victimes...

translation.en: they found over a liter of blood in his stomach.
translation.fr: ils ont trouvé un litre de sang dans son estomac.

translation.en: Yet he showed no signs of toxicity or dehydration.
translation.fr: Et il n'avait aucun signe de toxicité ou déshydratation.

translation.en: I don't know who I am...
translation.fr: Je sais pas qui je suis...
ou ce que je suis devenu.

translation.en: We need backup. All officers report.
Please tell me I got that.
-Then check it again, top to bottom. -Detective.
translation.fr: Revérifiez, de fond en comble. Inspecteur.

translation.en: I have to get home to my wife and my kid.
translation.fr: Je dois rentrer voir ma famille.

translation.en: You're not a free man, Swann.
but you don't know where Fayne is.
translation.fr: mais vous ignorez où est Fayne.

translation.en: And he thinks I sold him out. My family is in danger.
translation.fr: Il croit que je l'ai dénoncé. Ma famille est en danger.

translation.en: I'll see if I can send a patrol car.
No, no, no, no, no. Please, I need to-- to go to them.
translation.fr: Non. S'il vous plaît, je dois aller les chercher.

translation.en: Let me go get them, please.
translation.fr: Je dois y aller, s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: You saw what he did to your officers.
translation.fr: Vous avez vu ce qu'il a fait à vos officiers.

translation.en: Hi, it's Jess. Leave a message.
translation.fr: Salut, c'est Jess. Laissez un message.

translation.en: Call me when you get this. Bye.
translation.fr: Appelle-moi au plus vite. À plus.

translation.en: All right, listen to me, Dez. Go home.
Right now. Immediately. Lock the doors.
translation.fr: Immédiatement. Ferme les portes à clé.

translation.en: I'll be there in just a little bit. I'll call 911, okay?
translation.fr: J'arrive dans pas longtemps. J'appelle les secours.
Je suis là. Tout va bien.

translation.en: There was something following me. I swear.
translation.fr: Je te jure qu'on me suivait.
Où est Jess ? Je sais pas.
